data.title: Book Review: "So Long and Thanks for All the Fish" by Douglas Adams
data.meta_description: This book makes you almost believe you can fly or some such nonsense. Or is it nonsense? ðŸ¤” Anyway, brilliant as always with a lot of complex and thought-provoking word play, Douglas Adams does it again. This fourth installment of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" called "So Long and Thanks for All the Fish" starts off slow and feels different than the other books. As soon as Arthur's name is mentioned a few chapters in, relief will wash over you and the pace will pick up. A new character i
